humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides a gross description of the tumor size as 2.5 x 2.3 cm, which falls within the T2 category of being more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. The type of carcinoma is invasive ductal carcinoma, and the T stage is determined by the largest tumor size, so the T stage for this patient is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the tumor size is 2.3 x 0 x 2.5 cm, which falls within the T2 category. T2 tumors are defined as having a size of more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
